title: La Crepe Sautiere
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Buckwheat crepes (sarrasin in French), consist of buckwheat and water. Try the savory la provencale which has a filling of ratatouille and is vegan when you choose the buckwheat crepe. Other crepes can be made vegan, including sweet crepes.
